Keywords: Armor , Deity , Horsemen , Past , Ruler
Real Name: En Sabah Nur
Special Powers
THE HORSEMEN OF APOCALYPSE: At the beginning of the game, you may choose up to 4 friendly characters each of 50 points or less and choose a different effect below for each. This game, the chosen characters gain the Horsemen keyword and their chosen effect. War: Super Strength. Pestilence: Poison. Famine: Adjacent opposing characters can't be healed. Death: Exploit Weakness.
BEHIND THE SCENES: Apocalypse can't be targeted by opposing characters 5+ squares away.
CELESTIAL TECH: Apocalypse has PROTECTED: Mind Control, Outwit, and Penetrating/Psychic Blast. // FREE: Choose a standard power -or- [Colossal symbol]. Apocalypse can use the chosen power or ability until your next turn.
REMAKE THE WORLD TO MY VISION: Friendly characters with the Horsemen keyword can use Steal Energy.

Comments
January 22, 2021
Owlman166
My favorite starting line. Keep him in the back, Perplexing, Probbing and TK'ing friendlys, then when your team is weakened he can come in and play clean up in smaller games. Pro tip: Stay away from Pulse Wave! Also on his top click, if you're going mono-e-mono with someone in his range, pick invincible, and the most damage ya take is 3. Then Regen back up a couple clicks. If you're doubled, and high enough don't hesitate to pick the Colossal ability to let him swing on your stunned enemy twice with Flurry. :devious:
